name: LOST (itch) (gemon)
description:
"She never come back, please find her"

You got an info that your sister is going somewhere and she never coming back.  So you decide to find her, and finally you arrived at unknown location. With no clues about her disappearance, you desperately try to find her.

Go with nothing
No maps or anything, just yourself struggling to find your sister.

Bad Area
Thankfully there is no enemy, but it doesn't mean you will be safe. Every place is poisoned. You can find the house to heal yourself, if you can...

Controls :

  • WASD : Move
  • Up/Down arrow : Navigate menu
  • Left/Right arrow : Navigate pager message
  • Tab : Show pager
  • Shift : Run
  • Esc : Pause

Demo version
In demo version, you can only search in limited places.

So will you find her ? Or...
